ing: 1 (12 ounce) package Green GiantÂ® Riced Cauliflower Medley
des: "It looks like rice, it tastes like rice, but it's not! And no one will ever know, unless you tell them. This quick and easy Fried Rice recipe tastes like it just came from your favorite Chinese restaurant. Serve as a side or add cooked chicken, pork or shrimp for a fast and easy main dish."
ins:
Heat vegetable oil in a large nonstick skillet and cook garlic and ginger over medium heat 1 minute.
Add Green Giant RicedÂ® Cauliflower Medley and cook 5 minutes, stirring frequently, or until vegetables are until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and cook 1 minute.
Stir in cooked egg and continue cooking 1 minute or until heated through.
